changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO metrics (name,type,metric_value_type,metric_validation) VALUES ('coverage','SONAR','NUMERIC','LTE'), ('alert_status','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('bugs','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('reliability_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('vulnerabilities','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('security_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('security_hotspots_reviewed','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('security_review_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('code_smells','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('sqale_rating','SONAR',NULL,NULL); INSERT INTO metrics (name,type,metric_value_type,metric_validation) VALUES ('duplicated_lines_density','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('ncloc','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('ncloc_language_distribution','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('projects','SONAR',NULL,NULL), ('parent/version','GIT_XML','VERSION','LTE'), ('properties/java.version','GIT_XML','VERSION','LTE'); INSERT INTO metrics (name,type,metric_value_type,metric_validation) VALUES ('info_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('minor_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('major_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('critical_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('blocker_violations','SONAR','NUMERIC','GTE'), ('devDependencies.@angular/cli','GIT_JSON','VERSION','LTE');
